title: Science Teacher Technology Education Program Through Collaborative Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: In-service/pre-service teacher professional development program conducted in BYOD environments, validating practical applicability of learning outcomes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three digital tools applicable to science classes and design implementation strategies
Collaboratively develop and demonstrate at least one technology-integrated lesson module with peer teachers in a collaborative learning environment
Propose at least two customized digital science activity design strategies to enhance learner engagement

resources: Online Resources for Science Education Technology

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
